resources.string: Welcome to "ICloset" \n your intellegent closet in your pocket
ICloset is your companion while shopping, dressing-up and planning your daily outfits
Click on \"Dress me up\" in the home screen to let the application suggest the most suitable outfit from your closet to your occasion
Click on \"Help me match\" in the home screen to let the application help you match an item from your choice with other items that goes well with this item from your closet
Closet tab lets you browse your wears through the phone. \n The \"+\" symbol in the closet tab lets you add an item to your closet
Outfits tab lets you check out your outfits for each occasion. \n The \"+\" symbol in the outfits tab lets you assemble an outfit to add it to your outfits collection
lets your plan outfits in advance for future days and allows you to check weather
